title: Start
body:
<<revealValue Lance>>
<<revealValue Allison>>
<<revealValue Ruby>>
<<revealValue Franklin>>
<<if $lance_is_very_pleased is true>>
Lance is very pleased!
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
Lance is somewhat pleased.
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
Lance is feeling neutral.
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
Lance is somewhat angry.
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_very_angry is true>>
Lance is very angry!
<<endif>>
->Please Lance.
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    [[LanceVsAllison]]
->Anger Lance.
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    [[LanceVsAllison]]

title: LanceVsAllison
body:
Lance or Allison?
->Lance.
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    <<decreaseValue Allison>>
    [[AllisonVsFranklin]]
->Allison.
    <<increaseValue Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    [[AllisonVsFranklin]]

title: AllisonVsFranklin
body:
Allison or Franklin?
->Allison.
    <<increaseValue Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
    [[FranklinVsRuby]]
->Franklin.
    <<increaseValue Franklin>>
    <<decreaseValue Allison>>
    [[FranklinVsRuby]]

title: FranklinVsRuby
body:
Franklin or Ruby?
->Franklin.
    <<increaseValue Franklin>>
    <<decreaseValue Ruby>>
->Ruby.
    <<increaseValue Ruby>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
